title: PBE account
body: I NEED A PBE ACCOUNT PLS IM WAITING IT 5 YEARS PLS SOMEONE WHO STOPED PLAYING PLS{{item:3070}}

replies.body: We aren't able to expedite or force applications through.  We don't support trading PBE accounts, and doing so may risk closure of the account.  I know it may feel like it takes a while to be accepted, and this [FAQ ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq)can help provide more details on how applicants are selected.  Best of luck!
